name: Ajay Y

Our top products include: Custom T-Shirts: Perfect for teams, events, or brand promotions, crafted for comfort and style. Branded Caps: A stylish way to showcase your brand on the go. Tote Bags: Eco-friendly and practical, ideal for events and giveaways. Aprons: Made for functionality and durability, suited for hospitality and industrial environments. Sportswear: Performance-focused designs for activewear and fitness. Flags: Bold, eye-catching branding tools for both indoor and outdoor events. ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a business owner, marketing manager, or event coordinator seeking to enhance their brand's visibility through customized apparel. Ideal clients include: Corporate entities requiring branded uniforms or promotional wear Event organizers planning conferences, trade shows, or team-building activities Educational institutions looking for customized apparel for staff or students Non-profit organizations aiming to promote their cause through branded merchandise Startups and SMEs desiring unique apparel to establish brand identity If you know someone interested in elevating their brand through high-quality, customized apparel solutions, I'd be delighted to connect and discuss how we can bring their vision to life.
top_problem_solved: One of our clients organized a marathon event in Erode and needed custom T-shirts for participants. The challenge was that they couldn't confirm the exact quantity, as registrations would only close five days before the event. Despite this uncertainty, we successfully delivered approximately 2,200 high-quality T-shirts within the five-day timeframe. Our ability to accommodate last-minute quantities and ensure on-time delivery made their event a success, giving every participant a memorable branded experience.
my_favourite_bni_story: Being a part of BNI has been a game-changer for my business, Apparel Branding Company. One of my favorite BNI stories is about how a simple referral turned into a long-term business opportunity. A fellow BNI member referred me to a corporate company looking for custom T-shirt uniforms for their employees. The challenge? They needed premium quality, fast delivery, and budget-friendly pricing—all in one go. Thanks to our expertise in screen printing, embroidery, and premium fabric selection, we delivered high-quality T-shirts on time. Not only did the client love our work, but they also referred us to their partner companies. What started as a single order grew into a chain of repeat business and new referrals—all because of the strong trust and networking in BNI. BNI is not just about referrals; it’s about building relationships that create endless opportunities!

name: Devansh Nahata
top_product: At Nahatal Alloys, a large scale ISO 9001:2015 certified and BIS licensed company, we specialize in the alloying of various aluminium alloys that are used in the aluminium automotive component die casting industry. Our objective is to provide a zero defect product free from impurities and porosities to encourage efficient and smooth functioning in automobiles. We are one of the premium manufacturers producing 100% solid imported raw material manufacturing special grade aluminium alloys that are used in industries like aerospace, automotive, locomotive, electrical, medical and so on. Below is a brief list of aluminium alloys that we largely manufacture: 1. ADC12 2. A380 3. A356 4. A413 5. LM6 6. LM4 7. LM25 8. AlSi7Cu3Mg 9. AlSi10Mg 10. AlSi8Cu3, and so on. Each product i undergone a very rigorous and thorough testing procedure that involves chemical composition analysis, density test, grain structure, K-mould test, and vaccum reduced pressure test to ensure the highest quality of aluminium alloy that our customers can use stress free.
ideal_referral: Product Manufacturing Industries
top_problem_solved: One of our existing customers had an urgent requirement of 10MT aluminium alloys to exhibit their manufacturing to their customers as their current raw material in hand had defects. Due to our capability to supply large volumes in short term with out infrastructure we were able to supply the required quantity within 24 hours to our customer. Our customer service and product quality was well above their standards and the motive of the sudden requirement was promptly fulfilled.
my_favourite_bni_story: BNI has changed my life not only in business, but also personally. The culture that BNI exhibits and the accountability that it delivers is something that drew me towards it. A family member of mine had severe back issues. She had constant recurring pain that didn't show an sign of improvement even after regular physiotherapy and rest. When i shared about her situation to one of my fellow BNI members, he immediately with utmost compassion took this problem out of my hands by calling all the best doctors in his contact and arranged an appointment the very next day. Not only that, he also took the effort to follow up regarding the treatment process and checked if any help was required at every stage. Within weeks she was relieved of her pain and up and good to go. This made me realise that BNI is not just a referral organisation, its a place where emotions and relationships are given immense importance which create lots of opportunities in the future.

name: Rahul Prasad Jaiswal
top_product: Our top product line includes precision Ball Bearings, widely used across industries for their durability and smooth operation. These bearings are essential for machinery performance in sectors like engineering, manufacturing, and automotive, ensuring minimal friction and longer equipment life.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a manufacturing unit, engineering workshop, or maintenance company that frequently requires high-quality ball, roller, or thrust bearings to keep their machinery running smoothly. I also welcome connections to procurement managers and plant engineers who seek reliable suppliers with fast delivery and technical support.
top_problem_solved: The biggest problem we solve is reducing unexpected machinery breakdowns caused by faulty or incompatible bearings. ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a factory owner, utility head, or facility manager who needs accurate flow measurement for their operations. top_problem_solved: One of the top problems I solve is helping industries detect and prevent flow losses and inaccurate readings in their process lines. For example, a chemical plant in Hosur was facing inconsistent water flow readings that affected their batching process. We installed a high-precision electromagnetic flow meter and calibrated their system — which helped them improve accuracy by 95% and reduce downtime significantly. Providing accurate flow measurement = better control + better savings.
